Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://www.gnupg.org/ftp/gcrypt/libassuan/libassuan-2.5.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš echo e9fd27218d5394904e4e39788f9b1742711c3e6b41689a31aa3380bd5aa4f426  libassuan-2.5.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf libassuan-2.5.6.tar.bz2
ğŸš cd libassuan-2.5.6
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
